issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

Calling Ti.App.getSessionId() or Ti.App.sessionId returns __SESSION_ID__, on Android it returns a UDID like {{2e348c7f-d254-4861-9a90-d8c61df26a5a}}

h5.Steps to reproduce

# Add {{console.log(Ti.App.getSessionId())}} to an existing app.js
# Build for Windows

h5.Actual result

Check logs, __SESSION_ID__ is logged

h5.Expected result

The current session id should be logged
fields.summary: Windows: Invalid value returned for Ti.App.getSessiondId
fields.environment:
OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 10.0.14393
Appc core: 6.0.0-55
Appc NPM: 4.2.8-7
Ti SDK: 6.0.0.v20161002235150

comments.body:

*Environment*

Closing ticket.
